cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to -1 (negative value) will cause invalid thread configuration error and gNB initialization failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSymbols to -1 (negative value) will cause invalid TDD configuration error and frame structure failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSymbols 設定為 -1（負值）會導致無效 TDD 配置錯誤，並造成幀結構失敗。
